issue.title: [Docs][Python] Update python dev page after PyArrow C++ tests change
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17939](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17939). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17016 is closed, we need to update Python Development page:

https://arrow.apache.org/docs/dev/developers/python.html#testing-pyarrow-c

comments.body:
